rows.name: open
rows.notes: Controls visibility.

rows.name: setOpen
rows.notes: Called on dismiss/close; update your signal/state here.

rows.name: builder
rows.notes: Builds the dialog content; call close(reason?) to dismiss.

rows.name: onClose
rows.notes: Dismiss reason: escape/outside/close/etc (implementation-defined).

rows.name: modal
rows.notes: When true: traps focus, disables outside pointer events, scroll-locks, and aria-hides outside content.

rows.name: backdrop
rows.notes: Renders a backdrop element behind the dialog panel.

rows.name: exitMs
rows.notes: Presence exit duration for animations.

rows.name: initialFocus
rows.notes: Element to focus on open (modal focus-scope only).

rows.name: restoreFocus
rows.notes: Restore focus to the previously focused element on close.

rows.name: onOpenAutoFocus
rows.notes: Preventable hook to customize autofocus on mount.

rows.name: onCloseAutoFocus
rows.notes: Preventable hook to customize autofocus on unmount.

rows.name: labelledBy
rows.notes: Sets aria-labelledby on the dialog content.

rows.name: describedBy
rows.notes: Sets aria-describedby on the dialog content.

rows.name: role
rows.notes: Use "alertdialog" for urgent confirmations.

rows.name: portalId
rows.notes: Optional id for the Portal container.

rows.name: open
rows.notes: Controls visibility.

rows.name: setOpen
rows.notes: Called on dismiss/close; update your signal/state here.

rows.name: anchor
rows.notes: Anchor element used for Popper positioning (recommended).

rows.name: builder
rows.notes: Builds the panel element; call close(reason?) to dismiss.

rows.name: onClose
rows.notes: Dismiss reason: escape/outside/close/etc.

rows.name: trapFocus
rows.notes: When true, traps focus inside the panel (Popover becomes modal-like).

rows.name: initialFocus
rows.notes: Element to focus on open (when trapFocus or autoFocus is used).

rows.name: placement
rows.notes: Floating UI placement.

rows.name: offset
rows.notes: Distance between anchor and panel.

rows.name: viewportPadding
rows.notes: Padding when clamping/shift/flip near viewport edges.

rows.name: flip
rows.notes: Allow flipping to remain visible.

rows.name: slide
rows.notes: Keep popover within viewport by sliding along the anchor.

rows.name: overlap
rows.notes: Allow overlap with the anchor when shifting.

rows.name: hideWhenDetached
rows.notes: Hide the panel when the anchor is detached/offscreen.

rows.name: exitMs
rows.notes: Presence exit duration for animations.

rows.name: portalId
rows.notes: Optional id for the Portal container.

rows.name: open
rows.notes: Controls visibility.

rows.name: setOpen
rows.notes: Called by hover/focus interactions; update your signal/state here.

rows.name: trigger
rows.notes: The element that shows the tooltip on hover/focus.

rows.name: builder
rows.notes: Builds the tooltip element.

rows.name: openDelayMs
rows.notes: Delay before opening on hover.

rows.name: closeDelayMs
rows.notes: Delay before closing on pointer leave.

rows.name: interactive
rows.notes: When true, tooltip can receive pointer events (useful for richer content).

rows.name: placement
rows.notes: Floating UI placement.

rows.name: portalId
rows.notes: Optional id for the Portal container.

rows.name: open
rows.notes: Controls visibility.

rows.name: setOpen
rows.notes: Called on dismiss/close; update your signal/state here.

rows.name: anchor
rows.notes: Anchor element used for Popper positioning.

rows.name: builder
rows.notes: Builds menu content + item registry (items power keyboard + typeahead).

rows.name: modal
rows.notes: When true, blocks outside pointer events (modal-like).

rows.name: placement
rows.notes: Floating UI placement.

rows.name: offset
rows.notes: Distance between anchor and menu.

rows.name: flip
rows.notes: Allow flipping to remain visible.

rows.name: exitMs
rows.notes: Presence exit duration for animations.

rows.name: portalId
rows.notes: Optional id for the Portal container.

rows.name: openKey
rows.notes: Key of the currently open top-level menu (or null).

rows.name: setOpenKey
rows.notes: Updates the open top-level menu key.

rows.name: menus
rows.notes: Defines triggers + menu builders (each menu is built with Menu semantics).

rows.name: className
rows.notes: CSS class for the menubar root.

rows.name: portalId
rows.notes: Optional id for the Portal container used by all menus.

rows.name: open
rows.notes: Controls visibility.

rows.name: setOpen
rows.notes: Called on dismiss/close; update your signal/state here.

rows.name: target
rows.notes: Element that receives right-click/long-press events.

rows.name: builder
rows.notes: Builds menu content + items.

rows.name: disabled
rows.notes: When true, context menu won’t open.

rows.name: exitMs
rows.notes: Presence exit duration for animations.

rows.name: portalId
rows.notes: Optional id for the Portal container.

rows.name: createToaster.exitMs
rows.notes: Presence exit duration for toast animations.

rows.name: createToaster.defaultDurationMs
rows.notes: Default auto-dismiss duration for new toasts.

rows.name: controller.show
rows.notes: Push a new toast; returns an id.

rows.name: controller.dismiss
rows.notes: Dismiss a toast (keeps it mounted for exitMs).

rows.name: controller.view.portalId
rows.notes: Portal id for the toast viewport.

rows.name: controller.view.viewportId
rows.notes: DOM id for the viewport element.

rows.name: open
rows.notes: Controls popup visibility.

rows.name: setOpen
rows.notes: Called by trigger/outside interactions; update your state here.

rows.name: trigger
rows.notes: Button element; remains focused (virtual focus).

rows.name: options
rows.notes: Options list (disabled options are skipped).

rows.name: value
rows.notes: Currently selected value (controlled).

rows.name: setValue
rows.notes: Updates the selected value.

rows.name: fitViewport
rows.notes: Clamp maxHeight on short viewports and allow scrolling.

rows.name: disallowEmptySelection
rows.notes: When true, prevents clearing selection.

rows.name: placement
rows.notes: Floating UI placement.

rows.name: exitMs
rows.notes: Presence exit duration for animations.

rows.name: portalId
rows.notes: Optional id for the Portal container.

rows.name: open
rows.notes: Controls popup visibility.

rows.name: setOpen
rows.notes: Called by input/outside interactions; update your state here.

rows.name: anchor
rows.notes: Anchor element used for Popper positioning (often wraps the input).

rows.name: input
rows.notes: Text input (remains focused while navigating options).

rows.name: options
rows.notes: Options list (can be filtered by input).

rows.name: value
rows.notes: Currently selected value (controlled).

rows.name: setValue
rows.notes: Updates the selected value.

rows.name: filter
rows.notes: Custom filter; defaults to case-insensitive contains(textValue).

rows.name: closeOnSelection
rows.notes: Close the popup when selecting an option.

rows.name: exitMs
rows.notes: Presence exit duration for animations.

rows.name: portalId
rows.notes: Optional id for the Portal container.

rows.name: id
rows.notes: DOM id for the listbox element.

rows.name: options
rows.notes: Flat options list (use sections for grouped lists).

rows.name: sections
rows.notes: Optional grouped sections.

rows.name: selected
rows.notes: Currently selected value.

rows.name: onSelect
rows.notes: Called on selection (Enter/Space/pointer).

rows.name: shouldUseVirtualFocus
rows.notes: When true, uses aria-activedescendant and keeps focus on the root.

rows.name: shouldSelectOnPressUp
rows.notes: Select on pointer up (menu-like timing).

rows.name: allowsDifferentPressOrigin
rows.notes: Allow press down on one item and release on another.

rows.name: disallowEmptySelection
rows.notes: When true, prevents clearing selection.

rows.name: items
rows.notes: Tab triggers + panels (ids are wired automatically).

rows.name: value
rows.notes: Controlled selected tab key.

rows.name: setValue
rows.notes: Updates the selected tab.

rows.name: activationMode
rows.notes: automatic selects on focus; manual selects on click/Enter/Space.

rows.name: orientation
rows.notes: horizontal or vertical.

rows.name: ariaLabel
rows.notes: Optional aria-label for the tablist.

rows.name: items
rows.notes: Accordion triggers + panels.

rows.name: expandedKeys
rows.notes: Controlled set of expanded item keys.

rows.name: setExpandedKeys
rows.notes: Updates expanded item keys.

rows.name: multiple
rows.notes: Allow multiple items expanded at once.

rows.name: collapsible
rows.notes: Allow closing the last open item (single mode).

rows.name: checked
rows.notes: Controlled checked state.

rows.name: setChecked
rows.notes: Updates checked state.

rows.name: disabled
rows.notes: Disable the switch.

rows.name: ariaLabel
rows.notes: Optional aria-label for the control.

rows.name: className
rows.notes: CSS class for the root.

rows.name: thumbClassName
rows.notes: CSS class for the thumb element.
